doc.title: Cinemuerte
doc.plot: Jack Zimmerman, a has-been horror film director, and his wife meet a strange couple at a film festival in Spain. The couple's ideas of shooting a modern day snuff film inspire Jack to film a reality film starring his wife and friends. But when the couple from Spain makes a surprise visit to the party, the line between reality and fiction starts to blur. Before they can stop it, Jack and his party are forced into a real snuff film where the sadistic stakes are their own lives.
